subject: Order #SSN5537
description_text:
Hey,

I wanted to ask if the order is already out for shipping or what is the current process for the order?

Kind regards
Michael

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael Miemczyk,    We apologize for not updating you promptly about your shipment. Your package has been shipped.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047224806521
